abstract: A Facebook I.P.O. may not be around the corner, but investors may be offered a backdoor — through an initial public offering of Mail.ru Group, the Russian Internet group that’s an investor in the social network.
snippet: A Facebook I.P.O. may not be around the corner, but investors may be offered a backdoor — through an initial public offering of Mail.ru Group, the Russian Internet group that’s an investor in the social network.
lead_paragraph: Investors who have been patiently waiting for a Facebook I.P.O., may be offered a backdoor — through an initial public offering of one of the social network’s investors.

headline.main: Russian Facebook Investor to Go Public
